entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
